title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.10 - Accounting records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.10 - Accounting records

State Regulations
A complete set of accounting records shall be maintained by
the mutual trust investment company. Such records shall clearly distinguish
items of principal from items of income of such company. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
50.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
